> Web analytics involves collecting, measuring, and analyzing website data to understand user behavior and optimize performance

## Relevance for Research Groups

- Provides insights into audience demographics and behavior patterns.
- Helps identify effective communication strategies.

# Dashboards

## GHE Analytics Dashboard

### Steps

- Pull all data sources together into one place (ideally automated)
- Define a set of metrics from the available data
- Create visualizations that help you understand the data
- Share the dashboard with the team and public
